\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
Structure representing a digital image. 

It supports both linear and two-\/dimensional access (i.\+e., img-\/$>$data\mbox{[}p\mbox{]} or img-\/$>$array\mbox{[}y\mbox{]}\mbox{[}x\mbox{]} for a pixel (x,y) at address p=x+y$\ast$ncols).
